com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.scene

Class BaseGamescene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.scene.BaseGamescene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameScene
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EngineGamescene, ExtendedGamescene

    @RequiresInjection
public class BaseGamescene
extends Object
implements IGameScene
    Use as a base for game scenes.

      • injectDependencies

        @Inject
protected void injectDependencies(IParameterInjector.IParameterInjectorFactory parameterInjectorFactory,
                                          IEngineContext context,
                                          IControllerManager controllerManager,
                                          ICamera camera,
                                          IControlHandler controlHandler)
        Injects all dependencies for the scene.

        Note that this method will be called before any method injections of subclasses.

        See Also:
        initBaseDependencies(com.tokelon.toktales.core.engine.IEngineContext), initSceneDependencies(com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.controller.IControllerManager, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.model.ICamera, com.tokelon.toktales.core.game.state.IControlHandler)

      • assign

        public boolean assign(IGameState gamestate)
        This implementation will assign the given gamestate to the current gamestate, obtainable by getGamestate().
        Specified by:
        assign in interface IGameScene
        Parameters:
        gamestate - The gamestate this scene is being assigned to.
        Returns:
        True.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If gamestate is null.
